#summary Software on which Dark Matter depends.

The GWT aspects of Dark Matter are currently based on the [http://code.google.com/p/google-web-toolkit/downloads/detail?name=gwt-2.1.1.zip GWT 2.1.1 SDK].

[http://code.google.com/p/google-web-toolkit/downloads/detail?name=gwt-2.2.0.zip GWT 2.2.0 SDK]

Dark Matter also makes uses of the asynchronous notification mechanisms provided by the [http://code.google.com/p/gwteventservice/ GWTEventService].
